comments.author: Sandra_hakeem
comments.body: Like seriously dude?I was expecting that you would say something about 'em....like, atleast a description as to what Post you're referring to ...but nix.You got the balls dear... When I was a newbie, I'd never ask why my post gets deleted; after all,.who knows if it's some shitty wall of crap that I made? But it's different this days. You don't even sound like you wrote something reasonable there (cus I don't believe the mods would delete a meaningful post), except it goes off point or you eventually started a topic entirely different from the main idea... So just chill Â Edit: Quote from: mprep on December 01, 2022, 12:00:37 AMSee rule 1 in https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=703657.0.This is just exactly the same thing I was trying to describe above.when you fail to read the rules and get acquainted with 'em, that's what you get. This one might even get deleted as wellÂ   Sandra ðŸ§‘

comments.author: The Sceptical Chymist
comments.body: Quote from: mprep on December 01, 2022, 12:00:37 AMSee rule 1 in https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=703657.0.It's not clear if you're referring to the post OP made here or whatever post(s) he got deleted.Â  Probably doesn't matter much, as he's a complete newbie (presumably) and if he's a shitposter he's quickly going to find out that the environment here is hostile to him.And OP, assuming you're ever going to look at this thread again, most members have had some of their posts deleted (assuming they make enough of them).Â  When I was new--and even for a year or three afterward--I had plenty of mine get reported and nuked, and that's on top of the ones that were deleted in self-moderated threads.Â  Good luck or good riddance.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Such low quality posts don't belong in this forum OP, moreover if you are a topic starter. Try looking at how other members make good posts rich with content that is not spam and one-liners like your deleted posts.Don't make posts just for the sake.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: looks like you need to create a more constructive post. if you continue doing what you're doing(posting one-liner posts and it keeps getting deleted) I won't be surprised if you get a temporary ban. perhaps it would be best for you to just join discussions for now instead of creating threads, left and right.
